text: Vuga uti "Yemwe bagaragu banjye bemeye! Nimutinye Nyagasani wanyu; babandi bakoze neza kuri iyi si bazagororerwa ibyiza (Ijuru). Kandi isi ya Allah ni ngari (niba aho muri bitaborohera gusenga Allah, nimwimukire ahandi). Mu byâ€™ukuri, abihangana bazagororerwa ibihembo byabo byuzuye, nta kubara
